trustfund:
TF021196-REPUBLIKA SRPSKA - LOCAL
            INITIATIVES PROJECT - II,TF020434-EMERGENCY DEMOBILIZATION AND
            REINTEGRATION PROGRAM IN BHZ,TF020873-RECONSTRUCTION PROGRAM
            PREPARATION (BANK EX.)

abstracts.cdata!:
The assessment of outcome is
            satisfactory, sustainability likely, though the
            institutional development impact is only modest. Given
            Bosnia and Herzegovina's transitional stage, it was
            necessary that two entity level employment, and training
            foundations (ETF) be created, so as to focus attention on
            implementation issues; likewise, the creation of the Project
            Implementation Unit (PIU) was also necessary, since the
            employment bureaus were still not ready to provide
            demand-driven redeployment services, nor to provide the
            environment to promote social dialogue. For the long-run it
            is thus suggested that the PIUs be permanently integrated so
            as to institutionalize the management experience gained from
            active labor programs, and ETFs. However, ETF programs still
            require considerable reform, to administer unemployment
            benefits, and a range of active labor programs, including
            new labor redeployment mechanisms. Moreover, it has been
            puzzling (given the funding capacity of the project, not
            only from the Bank loan itself, but from donations from the
            Dutch, and Swedish Governments), why those shorter term
            activities, i.e., public works and small credits, were so
            much more successful in locking in additional donor support,
            a fact worth investigating further. Thus, lessons suggest a
            simpler project scope; relevancy of procurement rules in
            accordance to country circumstances; greater private sector,
            and local nongovernmental organizations' involvement;
            and, stronger technical assistance.
